problem_names:
lemma
  includes applicative_syntax
  shows "pure_monoid_add (+) \<diamondop> (x :: (nat, int) monoid_ap) \<diamondop> y = pure (+) \<diamondop> y \<diamondop> x"
translations:
lemma
  includes applicative_syntax
  shows "pure_monoid_add (+) \<diamondop> (x :: (nat, int) monoid_ap) \<diamondop> y = pure (+) \<diamondop> y \<diamondop> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. pure (+) \<diamondop> x \<diamondop> y =
    pure (+) \<diamondop> y \<diamondop> x
